title: 用CC菜单打开BossShop怎么打开！
txt_content: 用CC菜单打开BossShop怎么打开！求指令。

replies.author: lupohan44
replies.txt_content:
COMMAND: 'bs bossshop菜单名称'
KEEP-OPEN: true

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: mcvimik
replies.txt_content:
TreeDiagramE5:
  NAME: '&a菜单'
  ID: 399
  LORE:
  COMMAND: 'shop xxx'
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 5
  POSITION-Y: 5


command里面填写  打开boss shop的指令即可

replies.author: sgoye
replies.txt_content:
你需要给予菜单选项里面加上一行
KEEP-OPEN: true
这样你打开菜单里的这个物品的时候不会关闭GUI界面
